评论详情: The material is beautiful, but these are NOT "one size".  I had kimono's bought from the AAFES site before and they were One Size, these are not.  I am a size 12, the average American woman is a size 14, and anyone over a size 8 will say these are too tight.  Also, they have pockets?  These are house robes, why does anyone need pockets?  Also, the pockets bunch up right at the hips so that's unflattering as well as the small size.  Disappointed, because they are very beautiful.
